page.title: 14VISCOUNT TONYPANDY
page.content: George Thomas was born in 1909. He grew up in l39,Miskin Road, Trealaw and went to Trealaw Boys' School. From there he passed the entrance exam- ination to go to Tonypandy Grammar School. After he left College in Southampton he started to teach in Cardiff and then moved to 62 Ely Street, Tonypandy. In 1945, he was elected as Labour Member of Parliament for Cardiff. After a distinguished parliamentary career, George Thomas was elected Speaker of the House of Commons. In 1983 he retired as a Member of Parliament and Speaker of the House of Commons. Honoured by Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II with a peerage took the title Viscount Tonypandy.
